ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.
M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Actual number of months from Baseline
Sometimes I feel that I am being talked down to because of my mental health problems
Notes: 1=Strongly disagree;2=Moderately disagree;3=Slightly disagree;4=Neutral;5=Slightly agree;6=Moderately agree;7=Strongly agree

ElementDescription: Some people with mental health problems are dangerous
Notes: 1=Strongly disagree;2=Moderately disagree;3=Slightly disagree;4=Neutral;5=Slightly agree;6=Moderately agree;7=Strongly agree

ElementDescription: Very often I feel alone because of my mental health problems
Notes: 1=Strongly disagree;2=Moderately disagree;3=Slightly disagree;4=Neutral;5=Slightly agree;6=Moderately agree;7=Strongly agree

ElementDescription: People's reactions to my mental health problems make me keep to myself
Notes: 1=Strongly disagree;2=Moderately disagree;3=Slightly disagree;4=Neutral;5=Slightly agree;6=Moderately agree;7=Strongly agree

ElementDescription: People have avoided me because of my mental health problems
Notes: 1=Strongly disagree;2=Moderately disagree;3=Slightly disagree;4=Neutral;5=Slightly agree;6=Moderately agree;7=Strongly agree

ElementDescription: I do not feel embarrassed because of my mental health problems
Notes: 1=Strongly disagree;2=Moderately disagree;3=Slightly disagree;4=Neutral;5=Slightly agree;6=Moderately agree;7=Strongly agree

ElementDescription: I feel the need to hide my mental health problems from my friends
Notes: 1=Strongly disagree;2=Moderately disagree;3=Slightly disagree;4=Neutral;5=Slightly agree;6=Moderately agree;7=Strongly agree
e.g., Baseline, 6-Month Follow Up, Year 2, Daily
